h2_title: The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines
h3_title: North Shore of the Bitter Lake Luojia Fragrant Vine
content: The North Shore of the Bitter Lake Luojia Fragrant Vine can be found on the hill leading up from the large snake bones on the beach. Follow the stairs up and take the first left into a small alcove to find the vine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'North Shore of the Bitter Lake Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
The North Shore of the Bitter Lake Luojia Fragrant Vine can be found on the hill leading up from the large snake bones on the beach. Follow the stairs up and take the first left into a small alcove to find the vine.
